ygData.subject: Re: Permanet Server??
ygData.msgSnippet: With all due respect Zil, but I might sound like an asshole in my replies. So as per normal...answers below. ... From: LKW  1. Been a
ygData.messageBody:
With all due respect Zil, but I might sound like an asshole in my replies.
So as per normal...answers below.

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
1. Been a pioneer in the new server, I guess I won't be far from the
highest lvl group of players (well, maybe a big diff since I can't play EQ
16 hrs a day, but I guess it's still better than Innoruuk).

>>I'd think again because people who can afford to switch servers have more
than 16 hours a day to spare. The first guy to hit Level 50 in EQ took only
2 months.

3. Now we are all starting from scratch, chances is that we will be having
similar lvls as we progress in the game, that means it's much easier for us
hunt as a team in future.

>>For this, you will have to define "hunt". My friend is hitting Level 19
soon but he still sticks with me in the game whenever I page him.

4. Imagine next time you tell ya EQ friend abt our guild "Ahem, my guild is
the first guild in Prexus, blah blah blah..." Kinda cool if u ask me ;)

>>You have been a guildmaster before. You know its not easy to run. I've
been playing Online Games since I was Primary 6. Not that long you might
say, but long enough to have a "good view" of things. Did and seen things...

5. Lastly, been the pioneer players, our chances of becoming one of the
highest lvl in the new server is much higher, and this give us advantages
in role-playing in the game

>>Firstly, it seems we never ever did Role-Play with all the
"lah-loh-mah-ones" (grins)

If now we set up a guild in Innoruuk, we are just one of the many
many guild available in the server and not many pple heard of us.

>>Once more as you know, old doesn't mean best. When I was playing in
Meridian 59. I pked 2 members from the first ever guild formed in ALL
servers, that means the first and biggest gang around. They didn't lay much
hands on me though (grins) You just need to kick them hard enough to know
you mean business? Lets not talk about EQ cos I'm only Level 12 (blushes)

But if we all have our new guild abbrev in our chars in Prexus, surely it
will catch lots of attention - since more pple will get to notice our name
as
compared to Innoruuk. Once we make a name, our guild will start to kill
asses ard. ;)

>>This I totally agree THOUGH it sounds contradicting to what i said before.
